review: He's service oriented and clearly explained about problem to the Patient and friendly nature to the patient.

*** *** **** ****** ******* ** ******** I went to consult for prolonged 1 month cough.He didn't even asked for xray or any blood test. But still trusted him since he is an experienced doctor. *** ******* **** ** * ******** ********** * ********* ******* ****** ** ******** ***** *** ***** **** ***********. Not recommending..
Bad experience, I never expected  this kind of attitude in Apollo hospitals .He has not even discussed  more than 5 min and not listening our concerns.
Bad experience, few question asked related to the sufferings with a cold and strange attitude, no checkings done.  Only 5 min was the time of the consultation without deep questions, too superficial.
